data.title: The ultimate list of hottest male celebrities of all time
data.meta_description: From Zac Efron and Ryan Reynolds to Shawn Mendes and Timothee Chalamet, celebrate the sexiest men alive with a saucy list of the hottest male celebrities of all time.
data.text:
Right from Hollywood actors and sports legends to singers, this time we have carefully curated the ultimate list of the hottest male celebrities that are also exceptionally talented at what they do. Honestly, there has never been a lack of good-looking celebs when it comes to the entertainment industry. However, in this article, we have taken it upon ourselves to list down Hollywood heartthrobs that certainly are the Hottest male celebrities in the world.

Right from the legendary heart stealer George Clooney and forever celebrity crushes like David Beckham to mysteriously hot Zayn Malik and irresistibly witty Ryan Reynolds, we are here to celebrate the hottest male celebrities who certainly make your heart skip a beat with their drool-worthy looks.

25 sexiest male celebrities of all time

1. Timothee Chalamet

Birth name: Timothée Hal Chalamet

Date of Birth: December 27, 1995

Age: 27

Place of birth: New York City, U.S.

Profession: Actor

Nationality: United States, France

Years active: 2007–present

The actor has been in the limelight for being one of the hottest male celebrities ever since his 2017 movie Call Me by Your Name. In fact, Chalamet also received an Oscar nomination for this Luca Guadagnino movie. The handsome hunk has managed to win hearts ever since and has been named one of the Sexiest Men Alive by People magazine in 2019 and then again in 2023.

Timothée Chalamet 5 Popular Movies List:

Advertisement

Call Me By Your Name (2017)

Dune (2021)

Little Women (2019)

Bones and All (2022)

Lady Bird (2017)

2. Zac Efron

Birth name: Zachary David Alexander Efron

Date of Birth: October 18, 1987

Age: 35

Place of birth: San Luis Obispo, California, U.S.

Profession: Actor

Nationality: American

Years active: 2002- Present

Although Zac Efron made a place in our hearts as a sweet high school boy years ago when he played Troy Bolton in High School Musical, he is now one of the hottest men alive. The man not only has a huge fan base but has won a number of awards and accolades. Looking for a Zac Efron movie where he looked hotter than ever, you must watch Baywatch right away. (Thank us, later). He has been voted the sexiest man alive twice, once in 2017 and then again in 2023.

Zac Efron 5 Popular Movies List:

Neighbors (2014)

Dirty Grandpa (2016)

17 Again (2009)

Hairspray (2007)

The Paperboy (2012)

3. Michael B. Jordan

Birth name: Michael Bakari Jordan

Date of Birth: February 9, 1987

Age: 36

Place of birth: Santa Ana, California, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Producer

Nationality: American

Years active: 1998 - Present

Advertisement

Michael Bakari Jordan, popularly known for his role as Erik Killmonger in Black Panther was People’s Sexiest Man Alive in 2020. In fact, he also made a place in Time Magazine’s list of 100 most influential people in the world. The Black Panther has been seen in a number of hit movies including, Creed II, Creed III, Space Jam: A New Legacy, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, and many more.

Michael B. Jordan 5 Popular Movies List:

Creed III (2023)

Creed II (2015)

Black Panther: Wakanda Forever (2022)

Chronicle (2012)

Black Panther (2018)

4. Chris Hemsworth

Birth name: Christopher Hemsworth

Date of Birth: 11 August 1983

Age: 40

Place of birth: Melbourne, Victoria, Australia

Profession: Actor, Producer

Nationality: Australian

Years active: 2002- Present

No list of good-looking men can be complete without Chris Hemsworth’s mention. The man is a Marvel superhero for God’s sake. Aside from gaining massive popularity for his 2011 iconic Marvel debut as Thor, the man was even named the Sexiest Man Alive by People in 2014. If you have been looking for Chris Hemsworth movies, you must go for Spiderhead, Extraction, Interceptor, or one of his hit movies from the Marvel Cinematic Universe Collection.

Advertisement

Chris Hemsworth 5 Popular Movies List:

Avengers: Endgame (2019)

Rush (2013)

The Avengers (2012)

Avengers: Infinity War (2018)

Thor (2011)

5. Chris Evans

Birth name: Christopher Robert Evans

Date of Birth: June 13, 1981

Age: 42

Place of birth: Boston, Massachusetts, U.S.

Profession: Actor

Nationality: American

Years active: 1997 - Present

Well, when it comes to the hottest male celebrities that are also Marvel superheroes, we certainly have one more Chris and trust us, we cannot pick favorites. Chris Evans is another hot Hollywood hunk who managed to make his way into the hearts of audiences for his good looks and exceptional acting. Watch the best of Chris Evans as Captain America in the 2011 Marvel hit called Captain America: The First Avenger and Avengers: Endgame.

Chris Evans 5 Popular Movies List:

The Avengers (2012)

Knives Out (2019)

Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010)

Snowpiercer (2013)

Avengers: Endgame (2019)

6. Paul Rudd

Birth name: Paul Stephen Rudd

Date of Birth: April 6, 1969

Age: 54

Place of birth: Passaic, New Jersey, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Producer, Screenwriter

Nationality: American

Years active: 1991-Present

Best known for his role as Mike Hannigan, Phoebe Buffays's husband in the iconic television series titled Friends, Paul Rudd is one of the actors who doesn't seem to age. In fact, the man was named the Sexiest Man alive by People in 2021 which certainly makes him one of the prime candidates in our list of hottest male celebrities. With a gorgeous grin and exceptionally green eyes, Paul has managed to garner a lot of love for his roles as MCU’s Ant-Man, and his performances in Parks and Recreation, Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy, The Shrink Next Door, and many more.

Advertisement

Paul Rudd 5 Popular Movies List:

The Perks of Being a Wallflower (2012)

The 40-Year-Old Virgin (2005)

This Is 40 (2012)

Forgetting Sarah Marshall (2008)

Ant-Man (2015)

7. Henry Golding

Birth name: Henry Ewan Golding

Date of Birth: 5 February 1987

Age: 36

Place of birth: Betong, Sarawak, Malaysia

Profession: Actor, Television Host

Nationality: British, Malaysian

Years active: 2009-Present

Yes, the gorgeous Asian actor who played the role of Nicholas Young in Crazy Rich Asians is another one of Hollywood’s hottest men. If you have already watched Crazy Rich Asians we highly recommend adding Henry Golding's 2019 film called Last Christmas opposite Emilia Clarke to simply swoon over the 36-year-old actors’ looks.

Henry Golding 5 Popular Movies List:

The Gentlemen (2019)

Crazy Rich Asians (2018)

A Simple Favor (2018)

Persuasion (2022)

Star Wars: Visions (2021– )

8. David Beckham

Birth name: David Robert Joseph Beckham

Date of Birth: 2 May 1975

Age: 48

Place of birth: London, England

Profession: Footballer, Businessman

Nationality: English

Years active: 20-year

One of the most prominent former professional footballers, David Beckham has been one of the biggest crushes of all time. Married to Victoria Beckham, David has only gotten hotter with his age. The man has been the face of Armani since 2008 and has even been named the Sexiest Man Alive by People in 2015. He is indeed one of the hottest male celebrities the world has ever seen.

Advertisement

David Beckham 5 Popular Movies/TV Credits:

Modern Family (2020)

King Arthur: Legend of the Sword (2017)

The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015)

Haig Club: Welcome (Short) (2014)

Goal! The Dream Begins (2005)

9. Henry Cavill

Birth name: Henry William Dalgliesh Cavill

Date of Birth: 5 May 1983

Age: 40

Place of birth: St Helier, Jersey

Profession: Actor

Nationality: British

Years active: 2001-Present

There is something about British men that make them irresistible. Speaking of British men, Henry Cavill is one of the sexiest British actors that certainly makes to our list of hottest male celebrities. Looking for the best of Henry Cavill movies, we highly recommend watching, The Tudors, Netflix’s The Witcher, Sherlock Holmes, Enola Holmes, and Mission: Impossible – Fallout.

Henry Cavill 5 Popular Movies List:

Stardust (2007)

The Count of Monte Cristo (2002)

Immortals (2011)

The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015)

Sand Castle (2017)

10. Kim Tae-Hyung

Birth name: Kim Tae-Hyung

Date of Birth: December 30, 1995

Age: 27

Place of birth: Daegu, South Korea

Profession: Singer, Song Writer

Nationality: South Korean

Years active: 2013-Present

When it comes to listing the hottest male celebrities of all time, Korean men have certainly managed to rob hearts. Speaking of hot Korean men Kim Tae-Hyung popularly known as BTS’ V certainly makes the list. In fact, the K-pop star has not only been a singing sensation but has worked as an actor, composer, and also record producer. The gorgeously talented man is amongst the sexiest men alive. The best songs given by him include “Scenery,” “Sweet Night 4 O’Clock,” “Even If I Die It’s You,” and several others.

Kim Tae-Hyung 5 Popular songs list:

DNA (Love Yourself: Her, 2017)

Fake Love (Love Yourself: Tear, 2018)

Spring Day (You Never Walk Alone, 2017)

Not Today (You Never Walk Alone, 2017)

Save Me (The Most Beautiful Moment In Life: Young Forever, 2016)

11. Ryan Reynolds

Birth name: Ryan Rodney Reynolds

Date of Birth: 23 October 1976

Age: 46

Place of birth: Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

Profession: Actor, Businessman, Producer, Investor Philanthropist

Nationality: American, Canadian

Years active: 1991-Present

When it comes to the most thirsted-over celebrities, Ryan Reynolds is certainly the name. The man is not only acknowledged by the ladies but is crushed on by men as well. He’s fit, he’s handsome he is exceptionally witty and he is Blake Lively’s iconic husband. Watch the most of Ryan Reynolds in Hollywood hits like Deadpool, Green Lantern, The Adam Project, Free Guy, and Red Notice.

Ryan Reynolds 5 Popular Movies List:

Deadpool (2016)

Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle (2004)

Ted (2012)

Mississippi Grind (2015)

Deadpool 2 (2018)

Advertisement

12. Ryan Gosling

Birth name: Ryan Thomas Gosling

Date of Birth: November 12, 1980

Age: 42

Place of birth: London, Ontario, Canada

Profession: Actor

Nationality: Canadian

Years active: 1993-Present

Another Ryan that’s certainly a hottie is the La La Land actor Ryan Gosling. In fact, Gosling has been charming the ladies with his looks ever since he was seen in The Notebook and has only been aging with utmost grace. If you want to watch the best of Ryan Gosling, go for movies like Barbie, The Gray Man, First Man. Blade Runner 2045, Crazy Stupid Love, and many more.

Ryan Gosling 5 Popular Movies List:

La La Land (2016)

The Notebook (2004)

Blue Valentine (2010)

Drive (2011)

The Believer (2001)

13. Jason Momoa

Birth name: Joseph Jason Namakaeha Momoa

Date of Birth: August 1, 1979

Age: 44

Place of birth: Honolulu, Hawaii, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Filmmaker

Nationality: American

Years active: 1999-Present

While the handsome hunk made his acting debut in Baywatch: Hawaii, he gained massive popularity when he was seen as Aquaman in the D.C. cinematic universe and also when he starred opposite Emilia Clarke as Khal Drogo in Game of Thrones. It’s needless to say that the 43-year-old is only growing hotter by age and is one of the hottest male celebrities of all time.

Jason Momoa 5 Popular Movies List:

Conan the Barbarian (2011)

Wolves (2014)

Braven (2018)

Bullet to the Head (2012)

Aquaman (2018)

14. Idris Elba

Birth name: Idrissa Akuna Elba

Date of Birth: 6 September 1972 (age 50)

Age: 50

Place of birth: London, England

Profession: Actor, Producer, Disc Jockey, Rapper, Singer

Nationality: British

Years active: 1994-Present

Another dashing man with a sexy British accent who has managed to grab attention for his swoon-worthy looks has been Idris Elba. The man has certainly been a celebrity crush for many and was even named the Sexiest Man Alive by People in 2018. We highly recommend you watch the best of Idris Elba movies and shows like The Wire, Luther, Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom, American Gangster, Obsessed, Prometheus, Thor, The Suicide Squad, Beasts of No Nation, and many more.

Idris Elba 5 Popular Movies List:

Prometheus (2012)

Thor (2011)

American Gangster (2007)

Thor: The Dark World (2013)

The Take (2016)

15. Zayn Malik

Birth name: Zain Javadd Malik

Date of Birth: 12 January 1993

Age: 30

Place of birth: Bradford, West Yorkshire, England

Profession: Singer

Nationality: British

Years active: 2010-Present

Zayn Malik became an internet sensation as part of his band One Direction but he managed to stand out as one of the Hottest male celebrities when he began his solo singing career with his solo song titled Pillowtalk famous for featuring his former girlfriend, Gigi Hadid. After which, he gave a number of hit songs that certainly helped him in maintaining his celebrity crush status for his young fans out there. In 2020, Zayn and Gigi were also in the limelight for welcoming their first baby daughter named Khai.

Advertisement

Zayn Malik 5 Popular song List:

Let Me

Dusk Till Dawn

I Don’t Wanna Live Forever

Vibez

Pillowtalk (Mind Of Mine)

16. Harry Styles

Birth name: Harry Edward Styles

Date of Birth: 1 February 1994

Age: 29

Place of birth: Redditch, Worcestershire, England

Profession: Singer, Song Writer, Actor

Nationality:

Years active: 2010-Present

Another One Direction singer that made it to the list of hottest male celebrities is Harry Styles. The man has the sweetest smile, a fabulous gender-fluid fashion taste, and an exceptionally soothing voice, not only that he has had an iconically long list of celebrity exes as well. Styles has famously dated Taylor Swift, Georgia Fowler, and more.

Harry Styles 5 Popular Songs List:

As It Was

Watermelon Sugar

Late Night Talking

Satellite

Adore You

17. George Clooney

Birth name: George Timothy Clooney

Date of Birth: May 6, 1961

Age: 62

Place of birth: Lexington, Kentucky, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Director, Producer, Screenwriter

Nationality: American

Years active: 1978–present

The 61-year-old Oscar-winning actor has managed to win hearts for decades. While today he is one of the biggest and hottest Hollywood stars, he gained popularity after he was cast in the famous NBC show called ER in the late ’90s. Clooney is one of the stars who has been featured twice as the Sexiest Man Alive for People in the years 1997 and 2006. To watch the best of George Clooney you must watch, From Dusk till Dawn, Batman & Robin, Out of Sight, and Three Kings among several others.

George Clooney 5 Popular Movies List:

From Dusk Till Dawn (1996)

Ocean's Eleven (2001)

Up in the Air (2009)

Ocean's Thirteen (2007)

Out of Sight (1998)

18. Brad Pitt

Birth name: William Bradley Pitt

Date of Birth: December 18, 1963

Age: 59

Place of birth: Shawnee, Oklahoma, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Film Producer

Nationality: American

Years active: 1987-present

Your heart will have to be made of stone if it doesn't flutter when you see Brad Pitt on the big screen. It was right after he was seen in Thelma & Louise he managed to make cinematic history. In fact, it shouldn't come as a surprise that Pitt has also been named the Sexiest Man Alive twice in 1995 and 2000. If you are looking for Brad Pitt movies and shows, you must go for Babylon, Bullet Train, The Lost City, One Upon a Time in Hollywood, and Mr. and Mrs. Smith among many others.

Brad Pitt 5 Popular Movies List:

Fight Club (1999)

Se7en (1995)

Inglourious Basterds (2009)

Snatch (2000)

12 Years a Slave (2013)

19. Maluma

Birth name: Juan Luis Londoño Arias

Date of Birth: 28 January 1994

Age: 29

Place of birth: Medellín, Antioquia, Colombia

Profession: Rapper, Singer

Nationality: Colombian

Years active: 2010-present

Advertisement

One of the hottest Columbian singers the world has known, Maluma not only has over sixty million followers but has a pretty sexy profile. He was on the cover of the Sexiest Men Alive by People in 2020. To listen to the best of Maluma, listen to his hit songs including Tukoh Taka, Borro Cassette, Sobrio, Hola Señorita, Mojando Asientos, Hawái, and El perdedor among several others.

Maluma 5 Popular songs List:

Chantaje, Shakira featuring Maluma

Felices Los 4, Maluma

Borro Cassette, Maluma

El Perdedor, Maluma featuring Yandel

Vente Pa’Ca, Ricky Martin featuring Maluma

20. Shawn Mendes

Birth name: Shawn Peter Raul Mendes

Date of Birth: August 8, 1998

Age: 25

Place of birth: Pickering, Ontario, Canada

Profession: Singer, Song Writer, Musician

Nationality: Canadian

Years active: 2013-present

It’s impossible to not have a massive crush on Shawn Mendes if you have had the pleasure of watching the music video of the hit song Señorita. Right from his first song called “Life of the Party,” in 2014, Mendes has been a Hollywood heartthrob and has blessed his fans with a pretty hot campaign for Calvin Klein.

Shawn Mendes 5 Popular Songs List:

Stitches (2015)

Mercy (2016)

Treat You Better (2016)

I Know What You Did Last Summer (2016)

There’s Nothing Holdin’ Me Back, featuring Camila Cabello (2017)

21. Drake

Birth name: Aubrey Drake Graham

Date of Birth: October 24, 1986

Age: 36

Place of birth: Toronto, Ontario, Canada

Profession: Rapper, Singer, Songwriter, Actor, Businessman

Nationality: American, Canadian

Years active: 2001-present

Drake started his Hollywood career with the hit teenage show Degrassi where he played the role of Jimmy Brooks. In just a matter of years, Drake gained massive success as a rapper and singer with his iconic debut album, titled Thank Me Later. The handsome hunk has been rumored to have a number of high-profile relationships including, Rihanna, Bella Hadid, and even Jennifer Lopez.

Drake 5 Popular Songs List:

Passionfruit

Best I Ever Had

Hotline Bling

Rich Flex

Trust Issues

22. Dev Patel

Birth name: Dev Patel

Date of Birth: 23 April 1990

Age: 33

Place of birth: Harrow, London, England

Profession: Actor

Nationality: British

Years active: 2006-present

This handsome British actor started his career at 17 with the series Skins where he played the role of Anwer. Soon, Dev Patel became a household name after being cast in the global hit Slumdog Millionaire. Witness just the right blend of poise and goofiness by Dev Patel in movies like Hotel Mumbai, and The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel among others, Patel is certainly one of the Sexiest Men Alive!

Dev Patel 5 Popular Movies List:

Lion (2016)

Slumdog Millionaire (2008)

Hotel Mumbai (2018)

The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel (2011)

The Man Who Knew Infinity (2015)

23. Regé-Jean Page

Birth name: Regé-Jean Page

Date of Birth: January 24, 1988

Age: 35

Place of birth: London, England

Profession: Actor

Nationality: British

Years active: 2001–present

This Zimbabwean actor managed to make jaws drop with his smooth British accent when he played the character of Simon Basset, the Duke of Hastings in the famous Netflix show Bridgerton. Regé-Jean Page not only looked charming as the Duke but was an absolute treat for women viewers. It certainly broke hearts when Bridgerton fans heard Simon will not be seen in season 2. However, if you are looking for more performances by Regé-Jean you must be patient for his upcoming projects titled The Gray Man and Dungeons & Dragons.

Regé-Jean Page 5 Popular Movies and TV shows List:

Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves (2023)

Bridgerton (2020– )

The Gray Man (2022)

Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)

Saturday Night Live (1975– )

24. Richard Madden

Birth name: Richard Madden

Date of Birth: 18 June 1986

Age: 37

Place of birth: Elderslie, Renfrewshire, Scotland

Profession: Actor

Nationality: British

Years active: 1997–present

There’s no way, you have watched Cinderella and you think Richard Madden is not your prince charming. With soul-piercing baby blues eyes and that Scottish charm Madden is certainly one of the hottest male celebrities in the world. Apart from that iconic fairy tale movie the actor was also seen in Game of Thrones, Bodyguard, and Marvel Cinematic Universe’s Eternals.

Richard Madden 5 Popular Movies and TV shows List:

Game of Thrones (2011–2019)

1917 (2019)

Rocketman (2019)

Citadel (2023– )

Cinderella (2015)

25. Jacob Elordi

Birth name: Jacob Elordi

Date of Birth: 26 June 1997

Age: 26

Place of birth: Brisbane, Queensland, Australia

Profession: Actor

Nationality: Australian

Years active: 2015- Present

Whether you call him Noah Flynn for his role in the Netflix movie The Kissing Booth or Nate Jacobs for his role in the beloved HBO series Euphoria, Jacob Elordi has been stealing hearts with his cutest grin and well-built physique. Apart from the sweet boy next door roles, Jacob has also been cast in some of the darker films and TV shows, which included Euphoria, The Mortuary Collection, and Deep Water.

Jacob Elordi 5 Popular Movies List:

The Kissing Booth (2018)

2 Hearts (2020)

Deep Water (2022)

Priscilla (2023)

The Kissing Booth 3 (2021)

26. Manny Jacinto

Birth name: Manuel Luis Jacinto

Date of Birth: August 19, 1987

Age: 36

Place of birth: Manila, Philippines

Profession: Actor

Nationality: Filipino-Canadian

Years active: 2012–present

Manny Jacinto's charm goes beyond his tipped jawline, perfect skin, and soothing voice. To explore more of the actors’ charm and talent we recommend watching Netflix’s The Good Place, where he plays the innocent Jason Mendoza which basically shot him to stardom. The man is one of the hottest and most desirable Asian actors in Hollywood right now.

Manny Jacinto 5 Popular Movies and TV shows List:

Top Gun: Maverick (2022)

Once Upon a Time (2011–2018)

The 100 (2014–2020)

The Good Place (2016–2020)

Nine Perfect Strangers (2021)

27. Penn Badgley

Birth name: Penn Dayton Badgley

Date of Birth: November 1, 1986

Age: 36

Place of birth: Baltimore, Maryland, USA

Profession: Actor

Nationality: American

Years active: 1999-Present

We never knew someone could sound so sexy before we watched the Netflix drama titled You. Along with this Netflix show, Penn made girls drool over his looks and good-boy role as Dan Humphrey on the beloved CW show titled Gossip Girl. Born in Baltimore, Maryland, to Lynne Murphy Badgley and Duff Badgley, Penn Badgley is indeed the perfect boy next door even at 36.

Penn Badgley 5 Popular Movies and TV shows List:

Gossip Girl (2007–2012)

You (2018–2024)

Will & Grace (1998–2020)

The Stepfather (2009)

Easy A (2010)

28. Can Yaman

Birth name: Can Yaman

Date of Birth: November 8, 1989

Age: 33

Place of birth: Istanbul, Turkey

Profession: Actor, model, lawyer, athlete

Nationality: Turkish

Years active: 2013–present

Even if you are not more of a Turkish drama fan, you cannot deny the Turkish cast is unconventionally good-looking. One such beloved actor on our list is Can Yaman. The Golden Butterfly award-winning actor is popular for his performance in the famous Turkish romantic comedy Erkenci Kuş. You’d be surprised to know but this amazing-looking actor has a law degree and has even worked for a law firm before pursuing acting. He has recently launched his very own brand of perfume, called Can Yaman Mania.

Can Yaman 5 Popular Movies and TV Shows List:

Daydreamer (2018–2019)

Mr. Wrong (2020)

Dolunay (2017)

Viola (2022– )

El Turco (2023– )

29. Darren Barnet

Birth name: Darren Charles Barnet

Date of Birth: April 27, 1991

Age: 32

Place of birth: Los Angeles, California, U.S.

Profession: Actor

Nationality: American

Years active: 2017–present

This charismatic American actor is famous for his role in the famous Netflix teen comedy-drama titled Never Have I Ever. In no time he managed to become everyone’s boy crush. Along with his cutest role in Never Have I Ever, he was also seen in the Netflix romantic comedy titled Love Hard.

Darren Barnet's 5 Popular Movies and TV Shows List:

Criminal Minds (2005– )

S.W.A.T. (2017–2023)

This Is Us (2016–2022)

Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (2013–2020)

Never Have I Ever (2020–2023)

30. John Krasinski

Birth name: John Burke Krasinski

Date of Birth: October 20, 1979

Age: 43

Place of birth: Boston, Massachusetts, U.S.

Profession: Actor, film director, film producer, screenwriter

Nationality: American

Years active: 2000–present

Famous for his roles in The Office and A Quiet Place, John Krasinski is indeed one of the hottest men alive. While at first he was attractive due to his boy-next-door vibes but soon transformed his looks as he appeared with his rugged and ripped looks. But, he is not just another good-looking man in Hollywood, he is also a talented actor, director, film producer, and screenwriter.

John Krasinski 5 Popular Movies List:

The Office (2005–2013)

Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan (2018–2023)

Arrested Development (2003–2019)

CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (2000–2015)

BoJack Horseman (2014–2020)

31. Lil Nas X

Birth name: Montero Lamar Hill

Date of Birth: April 9, 1999

Age: 24

Place of birth: Lithia Springs, Georgia, U.S.

Profession: Rapper, singer, songwriter

Nationality: American

Years active: 2015–present

Lil Nas X became one of the most desirable voices after his songs Old Town Road, and MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) went viral on TikTok and Instagram. But, the 24-year-old rapper, singer, and songwriter is so much more than a sexy voice. Not so long ago, the singer came out as gay. The man has delivered authentic, unapologetic, fun, and poetic songs which helped him make it to the hottest male celebrity list.

Lil Nas X 5 Popular Songs List:

Rodeo ft. Cardi B

Old Town Road

MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name)

Holiday

That's What I Want

32. Khalid

Birth name: Khalid Donnel Robinson

Date of Birth: February 11, 1998

Age: 25

Place of birth: Fort Stewart, Georgia, U.S.

Profession: Singer, songwriter

Nationality: American

Years active: 2016–present

The hunky singer became a sensation after the release of his 2017 with his debut album, titled American Teen. The singer has a magnetic appeal but that’s not it, his talent has made him win plenty of awards including a VMA Award for Best New Artist, multiple Billboard Music Awards, and American Music Awards for his music. The singer has collaborated with a number of notable artists including Kendrick Lamar, Post Malone, Billie Eilish, Halsey, Benny B, and Logic.

Khalid 5 Popular Songs List:

Free Spirit (2019)

Heaven (2019)

Better (2018)

Don't Pretend (2019)

Eleven (2020)

33. Wentworth Miller

Birth name: Wentworth Earl Miller III

Date of Birth: June 2, 1972

Age: 51

Place of birth: Chipping Norton, Oxfordshire, England

Profession: Actor, Screenwriter

Nationality: American, English

Years active: 1998–present

Wentworth Miller’s compelling personality, exceptional looks, and critically acclaimed acting skills made Prison Break one of the best shows ever. Apart from the role of Michael Scofield in the Fox series Wentworth Miller was also seen in Stoker, The Flash, and Legends of Tomorrow. He is indeed one of the most desirable actors ever known.

Wentworth Miller 5 Popular Movies and TV Shows List:

Law & Order: Special Victims Unit (1999– )

House (2004–2012)

The Flash (2014–2023)

Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1997–2003)

Prison Break (2005–2017)

34. Patrick Dempsey

Birth name: Patrick Galen Dempsey

Date of Birth: January 13, 1966

Age: 57

Place of birth: Lewiston, Maine, U.S.

Profession: Actor, Racecar Driver

Nationality: American

Years active: 1985–present

The fans are still grieving the loss of his character in Grey's Anatomy. The actor was a heart-throb pretty much throughout the show. Nicknamed the "McDreamy" he was an actor who still makes women swoon. Although he was most known for playing the role of Derek Shepherd, he appeared in several other movies listed below.

Patrick Dempsey 5 Popular Movies List:

Sweet Home Alabama (2002)

Brother Bear 2 (2006)

Enchanted (2007)

Made of Honor (2008)

Valentine's Day (2010)

35. Leonardo DiCaprio

Birth name: Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio

Date of Birth: November 11, 1974

Age: 48

Place of birth: Los Angeles, California, USA

Profession: Actor, Film Producer

Nationality: American
